```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

source("dig_signal_proc.R")
```

```{r}
f <- 1000



df <- tibble(
  t = seq(0, 1, by = 1/f),
  s = 2*sin(2*pi*2*t) + rnorm(t, mean = 0, sd = 0.25)
)

filt <- gaussian_kernel(df$s, sigma = 10)

df <- df %>% mutate(
  s_filt = gaussian_kernel(s, sigma = 30, pad = "reflect")
)

df

df %>% ggplot(aes(x=t)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = s), color = "gray") +
  geom_line(aes(y = s_filt), color = "red")
```
